mapper.insert: insert into FootNavBar( FootNavBar_ID, Type_Id, Title, URL, Admin_ID) values (#{id},#{typeId} ,#{title},#{url},#{optId})
mapper.select: select FootNavBar_ID from FootNavBar where Title=#{title} and FootNavBar_ID!=#{id}
mapper.update:
update FootNavBar
Title=#{title},
URL=#{url},
Admin_ID=#{optId},
Type_Id=#{typeId},
Opt_Date=now()
where FootNavBar_ID=#{id}
update FootNavBar set Statu=#{statu} where FootNavBar_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select fNB.FootNavBar_ID,fNB.Type_Id,fNB.Title,fNB.URL,fNB.Statu as fnbStatu, fNB.CreateTime,fNB.Opt_Date,fNB.Admin_ID,fNBT.Name from FootNavBar fNB LEFT JOIN FootNavBar_Type fNBT on fNB.Type_Id=fNBT.Type_Id where fNB.ID=#{id}

select fNB.FootNavBar_ID,fNB.Type_Id,fNB.Title,fNB.URL,fNB.Statu as fnbStatu, fNB.CreateTime,fNB.Opt_Date,fNBT.Name from FootNavBar fNB LEFT JOIN FootNavBar_Type fNBT on fNB.Type_Id=fNBT.Type_Id where fNB.Statu=1
